Title: Relates to imposing a surcharge on certain sales within the Haverstraw-Stony Point Central School District
Summary: Imposes a surcharge on all sales within the Bear Mountain State Park to benefit the Haverstraw-Stony Point Central School District.
LawCode: Add §1501-d, Ed L; add Art 30-C §§1360 - 1362, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the tax law, in relation to imposing a surcharge on certain sales within the Haverstraw-Stony Point central school district
